description: Adding the quick marinade to your pan at the end of the cooking process results in a thick, glossy coating for your chicken that really elevates an otherwise simple dish. If you're not into cauliflower rice, by all means use regular rice! We're not your mom.
recipe_name: Glazed Chicken and Cauliflower Fried Rice

steps.flavor_text: First, get out your {i, chicken thighs, 1} and sprinkle them lightly with salt and black pepper.
steps.text: First, get out your chicken thighs and sprinkle them lightly with salt and black pepper.

steps.flavor_text: In your {e, medium bowl, 1}, combine 1/4 cup of {i, soy sauce, 1}, 1/4 cup of {i, honey, 2}, and 1 tbsp {i, sriracha, 3}. Mix the contents together, then add in your chicken thighs, making sure they're coated in the marinade. No need to cover or refrigerate.
steps.text: In your medium bowl, combine 1/4 cup of soy sauce, 1/4 cup of honey, and 1 tbsp sriracha. Mix the contents together, then add in your chicken thighs, making sure they're coated in the marinade. No need to cover or refrigerate.

steps.flavor_text: While the chicken takes a saucy bath, let's prepare the cauliflower fried rice.
steps.text: While the chicken takes a saucy bath, let's prepare the cauliflower fried rice.

steps.flavor_text: Microwave your bag of {i, cauliflower rice, 1} according to the instructions on the package.
steps.text: Microwave your bag of cauliflower rice according to the instructions on the package.

steps.flavor_text: While that's heating, mince 1-2 cloves of {i, garlic, 1} and about 1/2 an inch of {i, ginger, 2}. Remember, scrape off the peel using the edge of a {e, spoon, 1}. Mince half of a {i, yellow onion, 3}.
steps.text: While that's heating, mince 1-2 cloves of garlic and about 1/2 an inch of ginger. Remember, scrape off the peel using the edge of a spoon. Mince half of a yellow onion.

steps.flavor_text: Place a {e, pan, 1} or skillet over medium heat. We're going to season the fried rice with soy sauce and sesame oil if you have it, so you might want to have them handy.
steps.text: Place a pan or skillet over medium heat. We're going to season the fried rice with soy sauce and sesame oil if you have it, so you might want to have them handy.

steps.flavor_text: Once the pan is hot, add a splash of {i, neutral oil, 1} (such as canola or vegetable oil, although olive oil will work in a pinch). When the oil is heated through, add your onion, garlic, and ginger, and stir often, making sure that the garlic doesn't burn and turn black.
steps.text: Once the pan is hot, add a splash of neutral oil (such as canola or vegetable oil, although olive oil will work in a pinch). When the oil is heated through, add your onion, garlic, and ginger, and stir often, making sure that the garlic doesn't burn and turn black.

steps.flavor_text: Season the veggies with a pinch of salt and continue to stir until onion is softened. After a couple minutes, add in your bag of {i, cauliflower rice, 1} as well as about 1/2 cup of {i, frozen peas and carrots, 2}. Add another good pinch of salt. Fried rice is an art not a science, so don't be too worried about measurements.
steps.text: Season the veggies with a pinch of salt and continue to stir until onion is softened. After a couple minutes, add in your bag of cauliflower rice as well as about 1/2 cup of frozen peas and carrots. Add another good pinch of salt. Fried rice is an art not a science, so don't be too worried about measurements.

steps.flavor_text: Turn off the heat and taste. If it needs salt, you can add more soy sauce or just season with salt. Place the fried rice in a separate bowl and save the pan for the chicken. If you want you can wipe it out (let your effort level guide you here).
steps.text: Turn off the heat and taste. If it needs salt, you can add more soy sauce or just season with salt. Place the fried rice in a separate bowl and save the pan for the chicken. If you want you can wipe it out (let your effort level guide you here).

steps.flavor_text: Place the (probably not clean) {e, pan, 1} over medium-high heat and add a splash of neutral oil.
steps.text: Place the (probably not clean) pan over medium-high heat and add a splash of neutral oil.

steps.flavor_text: Once the oil is hot, add in your {i, chicken thighs, 1}. You should hear a sizzle.
steps.text: Once the oil is hot, add in your chicken thighs. You should hear a sizzle.

steps.flavor_text: Cook them on one side for about 3-4 minutes. Flip them and sear the second side for the same amount of time. Once the chicken is finished cooking, add the rest of the marinade to the pan, stirring to avoid the honey burning. It should begin to bubble and thicken up quickly. Mix the chicken around in the sauce until it has a nice thick coating.

steps.flavor_text: To check if the chicken is done, cut into a piece at its thickest point.
steps.text: To check if the chicken is done, cut into a piece at its thickest point.

steps.flavor_text: Plate up your desired amount of chicken on top of a serving of your fried rice. Optionally garnish with green onions and sesame seeds. Look at what you made!
